name: Shapewar (itch)
description:
This game is about war. You need your pawns to win this war. but your pawns are just cube. 

So let's try to win some battle to get more medals and use your medals to increase your strength. Upgrade your pawn's statistic, unlock new pawns, unlock some spells and don;t forget to upgrade your mana.
Mana is important to spawn your pawns, your life depends on your pawn's life and their life depends on your mana.
Defeat your enemies in many different area until the last boss.

50 Levels
10 Environments
6 Bosses

for "HOW TO PLAY" in the setting.
